remarks: Use strictly less-than in place of less equal in the real limit predicate.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Sep-2014.)
statement:
rlim2.1 $e |- ( ph -> A. z e. A B e. CC ) $.
rlim2.2 $e |- ( ph -> A C_ RR ) $.
rlim2.3 $e |- ( ph -> C e. CC ) $.
rlim2lt $p |- ( ph -> ( ( z e. A |-> B ) ~~>r C <-> A. x e. RR+ E. y e. RR A. z e. A ( y < z -> ( abs ` ( B - C ) ) < x ) ) ) $.
$d A x y z $.
$d B x y $.
$d C x y z $.
$d ph x y $.
$d y z $.
